Method.name: %OnBeforeReport
Method.Implementation: //updated for zen reports encryption Ar 30/3/11 s sc=##super() if $$$ISERR(sc) q sc s obj=##Class(questionnaire.QMEDREC).%OpenId(..QuesID) q $$$OK

Method.name: DisplayChildTable
Method.Implementation: s (tSC,rpt,stream)="" i '##class(%Dictionary.CompiledClass).%Exists($lb(repcls)) q "" s exe="s rpt=##class("_repcls_").%New()" x exe i rpt { s rpt.SubReport=subrep s rpt.MainReport="QReportMEDREC" s rpt.StripPI=1 s %request.Data("CONTEXT",1)=..CONTEXT d rpt.%ApplyURLParms() s rpt.ReportName=repname s tSC=rpt.GenerateStream(.stream,mode) } i $$$ISERR(tSC) set stream="" quit stream

Method.name: GetChildTable
Method.Implementation: n tSC, rpt, stream, exe, classDEF, propx, prop s (tSC,rpt,stream)="" i '##class(%Dictionary.CompiledClass).%Exists($lb(rep)) q "" s exe="s rpt=##class("_rep_").%New()" x exe i rpt { s %request.Data("CONTEXT",1)=..CONTEXT d rpt.%ApplyURLParms() s rpt.ReportName=repname s rpt.UseRawIOForXML=1 s tSC=rpt.GenerateStream(.stream,0) } i $$$ISERR(tSC) set stream="" quit stream

obj,obj.QUESErrorReasonDR s val=obj.QUESErrorReasonDR.ENTERRDesc q i ItemIndex="GenItemsAfterUpdate" s val="" i obj s val=##Class(web.SSUserDefWindow).webGetNewCtrlDateTime("111",obj.%Id(),obj.QUESCreateDate,obj.QUESCreateTime) q i ItemIndex="QDischMedRec_ID" q i ItemIndex="QDischMedRecList_ID" q i ItemIndex="QHomRev_ID" q i ItemIndex="QHomeRevReas_ID" q i ItemIndex="QMedAdminby_ID" q i ItemIndex="QBringMed_ID" q i ItemIndex="QPatImmun_ID" q i ItemIndex="QMedRiskIDLI_ID" q i ItemIndex="QMedRiskIDPA_ID" q i ItemIndex="QMedHistCheck_ID" q i ItemIndex="QHospital_ID" i obj s val=obj.QHospital q i ItemIndex="QGP_ID" i obj s val=obj.QGP q i ItemIndex="QGPCLINIC_ID" i obj s val=obj.QGPCLINIC q i ItemIndex="QSourceGPConfBy_ID" i obj s val=obj.QSourceGPConfBy q i ItemIndex="QSourceCPConfby_ID" i obj s val=obj.QSourceCPConfby q i ItemIndex="QSourcePatConfby_ID" i obj s val=obj.QSourcePatConfby q i ItemIndex="QSourceNHConfby_ID" i obj s val=obj.QSourceNHConfby q i ItemIndex="QSourceOwnConfby_ID" i obj s val=obj.QSourceOwnConfby q i ItemIndex="QSourceCNConfby_ID" i obj s val=obj.QSourceCNConfby q i ItemIndex="QSourcePLConfby_ID" i obj s val=obj.QSourcePLConfby q i ItemIndex="QSourcePAConfby_ID" i obj s val=obj.QSourcePAConfby q i ItemIndex="QLILivesAl_ID" q i ItemIndex="QLIRes_ID" q i ItemIndex="QLIDoseAdmin_ID" q i ItemIndex="QLIAdminAid_ID" q i ItemIndex="QLIMedList_ID" q i ItemIndex="QLISwall_ID" q i ItemIndex="QLIImpHear_ID" q i ItemIndex="QLIImpVis_ID" q i ItemIndex="QPAReadLab_ID" q i ItemIndex="QPAUnderEng_ID" q i ItemIndex="QPAOpBot_ID" q i ItemIndex="QPAMeasLiq_ID" q i ItemIndex="QPARecHomMed_ID" q i ItemIndex="QPASuspNA_ID" q } while (0) q val

Parameter.name: REPORTMANUALEDIT
Parameter.Description: users can edit ZEN report and set this to 1 to prevent regeneration upon changing questionnaire/layout

XData.name: ReportDefinition
XData.Data: <report xmlns='http://www.intersystems.com/zen/report/definition' name='QReportMEDREC' runonce="1" > <parameter expression="..QuesID"/> <attribute name='ReportTitle' expression='"Nat Medication Mgmt Plan"'/> <attribute name='timestamp' expression='$ZDATETIME($H, 2, 2)'/> <attribute name='username' expression='..Username'/> <group name='QuestionnaireData'> <attribute name='hasPatientData' expression='$s(obj.QUESPAPatMasDR:1,1:"")' /> <attribute name='patname' expression='obj.QUESPAPatMasDR.PAPMIPAPERDR.PAPERName' /> <attribute name='patname2' expression='obj.QUESPAPatMasDR.PAPMIPAPERDR.PAPERName2' /> <attribute name='patname3' expression='obj.QUESPAPatMasDR.PAPMIPAPERDR.PAPERName3' /> <attribute name='patname4' expression='obj.QUESPAPatMasDR.PAPMIPAPERDR.PAPERName8' /> <attribute name='patdob' expression='##class(websys.Conversions).DateLogicalToHtml(obj.QUESPAPatMasDR.PAPMIPAPERDR.PAPERDob)'/> <attribute name='patsex' expression='obj.QUESPAPatMasDR.PAPMIPAPERDR.PAPERSexDR.CTSEXDesc' /> <attribute name='patrego' expression='obj.QUESPAPatMasDR.PAPMINo' /> <attribute name='hasResidentData' expression='obj.QUESFHResidentDR.FHMicroAreaDR.FHCMAAreaDR.FHCASegmentDR.FHCSDesc' /> <attribute name='area' expression='obj.QUESFHResidentDR.FHMicroAreaDR.FHCMAAreaDR.FHCADesc' /> <attribute name='microArea' expression='obj.QUESFHResidentDR.FHMicroAreaDR.FHCMADesc' /> <attribute name='primaryResidentName' expression='obj.QUESFHResidentDR.FHPrimaryResidentDR.PAPERName' /> <attribute XData.name: ReportDisplay
XslFoXslt
XData.Data: <zenxslt> <xsl:template name='stylealtcolor' > <xsl:param name='num'/> <xsl:if test='$num mod 2 = 0'> <xsl:attribute name='background-color'>#DDDDDD</xsl:attribute> </xsl:if> </xsl:template> <xsl:template name="ScaleImages" > <xsl:param name="src"/> <xsl:param name="heightval"/> <xsl:param name="widthval"/> <fo:block> <fo:external-graphic> <xsl:attribute name="src"> <xsl:value-of select="$src"/> </xsl:attribute> <xsl:attribute name='position'>absolute</xsl:attribute> <xsl:attribute name='content-height'> <xsl:value-of select="$heightval"/> </xsl:attribute> <xsl:attribute name='content-width'> <xsl:value-of select="$widthval" /> </xsl:attribute> </fo:external-graphic> </fo:block> </xsl:template> </zenxslt>
